responses.discord: How should I know? Go ask in <#409184678730268672>

response_lines:
I can provide information on the following topics (use the `?***` command to see details):

`?wiki`: Get the link to the wiki
`?wiki.backup`: Get the link to the backup process wiki article
`?wiki.faq`: Get the link to the FAQ wiki article
`?wiki.installation`: Get the link to the installation wiki article
`?wiki.staking`: Get the link to the staking wiki article
`addr(ECC_ADDRESS)`: Shows the date first seen on the network, as well as the current balance
`tx(TXID)`: Shows detail for a specific transaction
